name: Witch.io
description:
Witch.io is a couch battle royal brawler action game. You can play with up to 4 players against each others. (Controller Required)

Controls:

Left Stick: Moving/ Aiming

A - Button : Fire

Team:

Nadja Clauberg (Artist)

Johannes Kutsch (Programmer)

Marcus Meiburg (Programmer)

Music:

https://ozzed.net/
